hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select wi.wiid,wi.wdname,wi.leaderid,wi.wistatus,wi.excutorid,substr(char(wi.begindate),1,10) as begindate,substr(char(wi.confirmdate),1,10) as confirmdate,substr(char(wi.crtDate),1,10) as crtDate, replace((select date(char(replace(substr(char(estimateFinishDate),1,10),'/','-')) )+Integer(trim(char(overtimetipstime))) days from WORKDEFINITION where wdid = wi.wdid),'-','/') as overtime, --实例发起时间2016/05/20+超时提醒时间5；只有2016-05-20格式的才能用日期函数；经过了两次格式的转换 case when wi.LEADERID = :userid and wi.excutorid not like :excutorid then (select count(*) from WORKLOG where wiid = wi.wiid and BTNACTION = '1' and titleDate =:week1) else (select count(*) from WORKLOG where wiid = wi.wiid and BTNACTION = '1' and titleDate =:week1 and excutorid=:userid) end as week1, case when wi.LEADERID = :userid and wi.excutorid not like :excutorid then (select count(*) from WORKLOG where wiid = wi.wiid and BTNACTION = '1' and titleDate =:week2) else (select count(*) from WORKLOG where wiid = wi.wiid and BTNACTION = '1' and titleDate =:week2 and excutorid=:userid) end as week2, case when wi.LEADERID = :userid and wi.excutorid not like :excutorid then (select count(*) from WORKLOG where wiid = wi.wiid and BTNACTION = '1' and titleDate =:week3) else (select count(*) from WORKLOG where wiid = wi.wiid and BTNACTION = '1' and titleDate =:week3 and excutorid=:userid) end as week3, case when wi.LEADERID = :userid and wi.excutorid not like :excutorid then (select count(*) from WORKLOG where wiid = wi.wiid and BTNACTION = '1' and titleDate =:week4) else (select count(*) from WORKLOG where wiid = wi.wiid and BTNACTION = '1' and titleDate =:week4 and excutorid=:userid) end as week4, case when wi.LEADERID = :userid and wi.excutorid not like :excutorid then (select count(*) from WORKLOG where wiid = wi.wiid and BTNACTION = '1' and titleDate =:week5) else (select count(*) from WORKLOG where wiid = wi.wiid and BTNACTION = '1' and titleDate =:week5 and excutorid=:userid) end as week5, case when wi.LEADERID = :userid and wi.excutorid not like :excutorid then (select count(*) from WORKLOG where wiid = wi.wiid and BTNACTION = '1' and titleDate =:week6) else (select count(*) from WORKLOG where wiid = wi.wiid and BTNACTION = '1' and titleDate =:week6 and excutorid=:userid) end as week6, case when wi.LEADERID = :userid and wi.excutorid not like :excutorid then (select count(*) from WORKLOG where wiid = wi.wiid and BTNACTION = '1' and titleDate =:week7) else (select count(*) from WORKLOG where wiid = wi.wiid and BTNACTION = '1' and titleDate =:week7 and excutorid=:userid) end as week7 from WORKINSTANCE wi where (wi.leaderid like :leaderid or wi.excutorid like :excutorid ) and substr(char(wi.crtDate),1,10) <=:week7 order by wi.crtdate desc

select win.initiatorid,win.wdname,win.cycle, win.leadername,wlo.excutorname,win.wistatus, win.begindate,win.crtdate, wlo.wlid,wlo.wiid,wlo.excutorid, wlo.titledate,wlo.actualdealwithdate, wlo.excutetime,wlo.wldescription, case when wlo.btnaction='1' then '已执行' when wlo.btnaction='2' then '未执行' end as btnaction from worklog wlo left join workinstance win on wlo.wiid=win.wiid where 1=1

select wi.wiid , wi.wistatus , wi.wdname , wi.INITIATORID , wi.cycle , wi.leaderid , wi.excutorid , wi.leadername , wi.excutorname , wi.crtdate, replace((select date(char(replace(substr(char(estimateFinishDate),1,10),'/','-')) )+Integer(trim(char(overtimetipstime))) days from WORKDEFINITION where wdid = wi.wdid),'-','/') as overtime FROM WORKINSTANCE wi WHERE wi.wistatus IN( '执行中' , '未执行' ) AND( wi.excutorid LIKE :excutorid ) AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT * FROM worklog wl WHERE wl.BTNACTION='1' AND LOCATE(wl.excutorid ,wi.excutorid ) > 0 AND wl.EXCUTORID = :userid and wl.wiid = wi.wiid ) ORDER BY wi.CRTDATE

select * from (select rownumber() over() as id, wi.wiid , wi.wistatus , wi.wdname , wi.INITIATORID , wi.cycle , wi.leaderid , wi.excutorid , wi.leadername , wi.excutorname , wi.crtdate, replace((select date(char(replace(substr(char(estimateFinishDate),1,10),'/','-')) )+Integer(trim(char(overtimetipstime))) days from WORKDEFINITION where wdid = wi.wdid),'-','/') as overtime FROM WORKINSTANCE wi WHERE wi.wistatus IN( '执行中' , '未执行' ) AND (wi.excutorid LIKE :excutorid or wi.leaderid = :leaderid)
AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT * FROM worklog wl WHERE wl.BTNACTION='1' AND LOCATE(wl.excutorid ,wi.excutorid ) > 0 AND wl.EXCUTORID = :userid and wl.wiid = wi.wiid ) ORDER BY wi.CRTDATE desc) where id <4

select case when sum(round(trim(char(case when excutetime is null or excutetime = '' then '0' else excutetime end)),2)) is null then 0 else sum(round(trim(char(case when excutetime is null or excutetime = '' then '0' else excutetime end)),2)) end as totaltime from WORKLOG where wiid = :wiid

select Max(wi.CONFIRMDATE) maxovertime,wi.WDID wdid from WORKINSTANCE wi left join WORKDEFINITION wd on wd.WDID = wi.WDID where wd.ESTIMATEFINISHDATE<=:currenttime and (wi.wistatus='结束' or wi.wistatus='终止') group by wi.WDID
